name: thirdeye
description: Two way chat between Discord and Minecraft Bedrock

scripts.copy:assets: cp -R src/Install_NodeJS_Modules.bat src/Run.bat src/whitelist.json package.json LICENSE README.md .build
scripts.build: npm run clean; npm run mkDirs; ./node_modules/typescript/bin/tsc -p tsconfig.json; npm run copy:assets; npm run copy:ansicon; node modify-package.js
scripts.mkdir_win: npm run mkdir_win_build && npm run mkdir_win_bin
scripts.copy_assets_win: npm run copy_assets_win1 && npm run copy_ansicon_win
scripts.build_win: npm run clean_win && npm run mkdir_win 1>nul && node node_modules\typescript\bin\tsc -p tsconfig.json && npm run copy_assets_win 1>nul && node modify-package.js
scripts.bundle: npm run build && mkdir -p dist && (cd .build && zip -r ../dist/thirdeye-v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version").zip .) && zip -j dist/thirdeye-v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version").zip local.env.example
scripts.bundle_win: npm run build_win && if not exist dist mkdir dist && powershell -Command "Compress-Archive -Path .build\*, local.env.example -DestinationPath dist/thirdeye-v$((Get-Content package.json | ConvertFrom-Json).version).zip -Force"
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm run bundle
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm run bundle
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm run bundle
scripts.publish: npm run bundle && gh release create v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") --title "ThirdEye v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" --generate-notes ./dist/thirdeye-v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version").zip
scripts.publish:win: npm run bundle_win && gh release create v%npm_package_version% --title "ThirdEye v%npm_package_version%" --generate-notes ./dist/thirdeye-v%npm_package_version%.zip
